name: teleport-tokscope
description: TikTok data collection with TEE support

scripts.dev:enclave: npm run build && cd tokscope-enclave && npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run dev:modules & npm run dev:enclave
scripts.clean: docker compose down && rm -rf output/*.json output/*.txt
scripts.check: npm run build && node -c workbench.js && node -c lib/mobile-api-client.js && node -c lib/browser-automation-client.js && node -c lib/web-api-client.js && node -c tests/test-direct-api.js && node -c tests/test-watch-history.js && node -c tests/watch-history.test.js

author: Teleport
